CompetitionID.label: CompetitionID
CompetitionID.notProvided: The CompetitionID field is required but was not provided.
CompetitionID.invalidType: The CompetitionID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

Name.label: Name
Name.notProvided: The Name field is required but was not provided.
Name.invalidType: The Name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
Name.invalidLength: The Name field is too long. This field must be no more than 100 bytes long.

StartDate.label: StartDate
StartDate.invalidType: The StartDate field does not contain valid data. This field must be a date value.

EndDate.label: EndDate
EndDate.invalidType: The EndDate field does not contain valid data. This field must be a date value.
